WHITLEY.reference: @article{whitleyRef, title={A hyper-rugged multi-modal benchmark for evolutionary strategies}, author={Whitley, Darrell}, journal={Evolutionary Computation}, year={2021}}
WHITLEY.summary: Continuous, non-convex, and very rugged. Highly multimodal with many local minima. Global minimum at (1,1,...,1) with value 0.
